Moreover, Walmart's return on equity (ROE) of 23.7% reflects a strong profitability landscape for shareholders. Walmart's financial flexibility is further illustrated by its positive free cash flow of $10.39 billion. Thank you for presenting the bullish case for Walmart (WMT). While it is true that Walmart has demonstrated strong earnings growth and operational efficiency, I must emphasize that these positive indicators are overshadowed by significant fundamental and technical risks that warrant a cautious approach to investment in the company.
